item.title: 移民与海关执法局（ICE）的一位高级官员说，只需对立法稍作修改，就可以允许更多的国土安全调查局特工调查毒品犯罪，而无需首先获得司法部的授权。
item.description: It would only take a small change in legislation to allow more Homeland Security Investigations agents to investigate drug crimes without first getting the authority to do so from the Justice Department, a top ICE official said. trib.al/rbGifXf

item.title:
据美国电话电报公司（AT&T）称，周四美国用户受到的临时网络中断是由软件更新引起的。
更多信息
item.description:
A temporary network disruption that affected AT&T customers in the U.S. on Thursday was caused by a software update, according to the company.

Read more: trib.al/8B5lkRv

item.title: 美国电话电报公司（AT&T）在一份声明中说，周四影响美国用户的临时网络中断是由软件更新引起的。
item.description: A temporary network disruption that affected AT&T customers in the U.S. on Thursday was caused by a software update, the company said in a statement. trib.al/ESKjJij

item.title:
脱口秀主持人和媒体名人温迪-威廉姆斯（Wendy Williams）的护理团队宣布，她被诊断患有原发性进行性失语症和额颞叶痴呆症。
以下是有关失语症的知识：
item.description:
Talk show host and media personality Wendy Williams has been diagnosed with primary progressive aphasia and frontotemporal dementia, her care team announced.

Here's what to know about aphasia: trib.al/W2Ta3Ds

item.title: 美国国家航空航天局（NASA）本周宣布，正在招募合格人员参加为期一年的 "红色星球 "模拟任务。
item.description: NASA is recruiting qualified individuals to participate in a yearlong mission on a simulated version of the Red Planet, the agency announced this week. trib.al/OxYf5Kl

item.title: R to @ABC：最新消息：布莱恩-史蒂文-史密斯（Brian Steven Smith）在谋杀两名阿拉斯加原住民妇女的 14 项指控中均被判有罪。
item.description: LATEST: Brian Steven Smith found guilty on all 14 counts in the murder of two Native Alaska women. trib.al/4flHfWl

item.title: 劳工部已对一家肉类包装清洁公司发出临时限制令，指控该公司在两个州实施 "压迫童工 "行为。
item.description: The Labor Department has issued a temporary restraining order against a meatpacking cleaning company for alleged "oppressive child labor" practices in two states. trib.al/NluzY4Y

item.title: 玛蒂-里普利（Maddie Ripley）去年成为缅因州第一位赢得高中男子摔跤冠军的女孩，上周末她在一天内击败了三名男孩，成功卫冕。
item.description: Maddie Ripley became the first girl to win a high school wrestling title against boys in Maine last year — and she defended her crown over the weekend when she defeated three boys in one day. trib.al/G31a5mA

item.title: 对被控谋杀 30 岁的凯瑟琳-乔-亨利（Kathleen Jo Henry）和 52 岁的维罗妮卡-阿布丘克（Veronica Abouchuk）的男子的审判已经做出判决，这两名阿拉斯加原住民妇女分别死于 2019 年和 2018 年。
item.description: A verdict has been reached in the trial of the man charged with the murders of 30-year-old Kathleen Jo Henry and 52-year-old Veronica Abouchuk, two Native Alaskan women who died in 2019 and 2018. trib.al/oUEss3U

item.title: 美国财政部发言人表示，在俄罗斯入侵乌克兰两年之际，美国政府将于周五对俄罗斯、其支持者及其战争机器实施500多项制裁。
item.description: The U.S. on Friday will impose over 500 sanctions on Russia, its enablers, and its war machine as the administration marks two years since Russia invaded Ukraine, according to a Treasury spokesperson. trib.al/EV0eZ6T

item.title: 有报道称，拜登总统正在考虑采取行政措施来加强庇护限制，对此，拜登总统周四遭到了共和党人和一些进步民主党人的批评。
item.description: Pres. Biden on Thursday faced criticism from Republicans and some progressive Democrats over reports that he is considering executive action to tighten asylum restrictions. trib.al/OS1Yq8j

item.title: 最新消息奥德修斯号着陆器实现历史性登月。这是 50 多年来美国制造的航天器首次登陆月球。
item.description: JUST IN: Odysseus lander makes historic Moon landing. The lunar landing is the first by a U.S.-built spacecraft in more than 50 years. trib.al/OkfyiM0

item.title:
RT by @ABC："欢迎来到月球"
奥德修斯成功登陆月球。更多精彩，尽在@ABC新闻直播间。
item.description:
"Welcome to the moon."

Odysseus successfully touches down on the Moon. More on @ABCNewsLive now. trib.al/YJvPw7E

item.title: 佐治亚大学雅典分校的一名女学生周四在校园内跑步时被发现死亡，校方官员表示，这涉嫌谋杀。
item.description: Foul play is suspected after a woman who went for a run on the University of Georgia's Athens campus was found dead on Thursday, school officials said. trib.al/g7Ghpi4

item.title:
随着时间进入 2024 年，去年大部分时间低迷的房地产市场开始升温。
然而，最近几周，市场再次降温，原因就在这里：
item.description:
A sluggish housing market for most of last year began to heat up as the calendar turned to 2024.

In recent weeks, however, the market has cooled once again — and here's why: trib.al/bfSJrw9

item.title:
一名 17 岁的高中生正在捍卫她的桂冠--上周末，她赢得了缅因州摔跤冠军，在一天之内击败了三名男孩。
她说，连续的胜利表明 "女孩们都很努力"。
这就是麦迪的故事：
item.description:
A 17-year-old high school senior is defending her crown — over the weekend, she won a Maine state wrestling title, defeating three boys in a single day.

The back-to-back victories, she said, show that "girls are working hard."

This is Maddie's story: abcnews.go.com/US/fluke-main…

item.title: 特别顾问办公室称，亨特-拜登案调查中心被起诉的前联邦调查局线人亚历山大-斯米尔诺夫（Alexander Smirnov）周四再次被捕。
item.description: Alexander Smirnov, the indicted former FBI informant at the center of the Hunter Biden probe, was re-arrested Thursday, the special counsel's office said. trib.al/8wHghTo

item.title: 一名法官周四裁定，得克萨斯州一名黑人高中生因拒绝改变发型而面临的处罚不违反该州的《皇冠法》（CROWN Act），该法禁止基于种族的发型歧视。
item.description: A judge ruled Thursday that the punishment faced by a Black high school student in Texas for refusing to change his hairstyle does not violate the state's CROWN Act, which prohibits race-based hair discrimination. trib.al/W3tr0Iv

item.title: 曼哈顿地区检察官阿尔文-布拉格（Alvin Bragg）批评亚利桑那州马里科帕县的检察官不愿引渡纽约市的一名谋杀嫌疑人，称她在 "谋杀案中玩政治游戏"。
item.description: Manhattan District Attorney Alvin Bragg criticized his Maricopa County, Arizona, counterpart who doesn't want to extradite a New York City murder suspect, saying she's playing "political games in a murder case." trib.al/S6ZQ5Nh

item.title: 佛罗里达州州长罗恩-德桑蒂斯（Ron DeSantis）排除了成为特朗普副总统的可能性，并指责前助手的攻击是 "有仇必报"。
item.description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis rules out being Trump's VP, blames ex-aides with "ax to grind" for attacks. trib.al/XkbAcQv

item.title: 特朗普将法律纠纷与迫害俄罗斯持不同政见者阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的行为相提并论。
item.description: Trump doubles down on comparing legal troubles to persecution of Russian dissident Alexei Navalny. trib.al/Yiux6qN

item.title: 俄罗斯反对派领导人阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼长期从事政治活动和反腐败宣传，从领导抗议活动到发表揭露政府欺诈行为的文章。
item.description: Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny had a long history of political activism and anti-corruption advocacy from leading protests to publishing exposés of government fraud. trib.al/5ZV76eG

item.title: 新提交的法庭文件显示，被指控捏造拜登总统及其儿子亨特各受贿 500 万美元的线人据称与俄罗斯情报部门有高层接触。
item.description: The informant accused of fabricating a story about Pres. Biden and his son, Hunter, taking $5 million each in bribes allegedly had high-level Russian intelligence contacts, newly filed court documents show. trib.al/0zNUaym

item.title:
美国航空公司正在推动旅客直接通过航空公司购买机票以获得忠诚积分，并提高了托运行李的费用。
以下是新政策变化的相关信息：
item.description:
American Airlines is pushing travelers to purchase flights directly through the airline to earn loyalty points and has raised the cost of checked baggage.

Here's what to know about the new policy changes: trib.al/iBm5fhq

item.title: 今年 4 月，北美将迎来 20 年来的最后一次日全食--现在，达美航空公司宣布推出一个航班，专门供乘客沿日全食路径近距离观赏日食。
item.description: North America will experience its last total solar eclipse for 20 years in April — and now Delta Airlines has announced a flight specifically intended for passengers to have an up-close view of the solar eclipse along the path of totality. trib.al/YL1rQx8

item.title: 海莉誓言继续战斗，而特朗普的团队则表示，他离获得共和党提名还有几周时间。
item.description: As Haley vows to fight on, Trump's team says he's weeks away from clinching Republican nomination. trib.al/PtNrHDs

item.title:
Capital One 收购 Discovery 的决定可能会建立一个新的巨型公司，从而撼动信用卡行业。
这对消费者意味着什么？
item.description:
Capital One's decision to acquire Discovery could establish a new megafirm that shakes up the credit card industry.

Here's what that could mean for consumers: trib.al/POtkoSN

item.title: RT by @ABC：纽约总检察长莱蒂西亚-詹姆斯（Letitia James）告诉 ABC 新闻，如果前总统无法找到现金来支付他在民事欺诈案中被指控的近 3.55 亿美元，她准备没收他的资产。@AaronKatersky 报道。
item.description: New York Attorney General Letitia James told ABC News she is prepared to seize the former president's assets if he is unable to find the cash to cover the nearly $355 million he was charged in his civil fraud case. @AaronKatersky reports. trib.al/8oUdCFo

item.title: 前迪斯尼频道《好运查理》（Good Luck Charlie）女星布里吉特-门德勒（Bridgit Mendler）宣布，她的新项目 Northwood Space 将涉足太空产业。
item.description: Bridgit Mendler, the former Disney Channel star of "Good Luck Charlie," announced she is venturing into the space industry with her new project Northwood Space. trib.al/Kz5UtTn

item.title: 在法官下令前总统特朗普为其民事欺诈案支付 3.54 亿美元的四天后，纽约州总检察长莱蒂娅-詹姆斯告诉 @ABC 新闻，如果特朗普无法找到现金来支付罚款，她准备没收他的资产。
item.description: Four days after a judge ordered former Pres. Trump to pay $354 million in his civil fraud case, New York Attorney General Letitia James told @ABC News that she is prepared to seize Trump's assets if he is unable to find the cash to cover the fine. trib.al/AUqq8yg
